channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security

item.title: CVE-2021-29802|2024-08-03T22:18:03.142Z -- ibm -- security
item.description: IBM Security SOAR performs an operation at a privilege level that is higher than the minimum level required, which creates new weaknesses or amplifies the consequences of other weaknesses.

item.title: CVE-2021-29704|2024-08-03T22:18:01.476Z -- ibm -- security
item.description: IBM Security SOAR uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information.
